headline: Ask HN: What are the ways you go about getting comfortable with a new codebase?
description:
Tools like Eclipse's Java Browsing Perspective(https://querix.com/go/beginner/Content/05_workbench/01_ls/02_interface/01_perspectives/java_browsing.htm), Visual Studio's Object Browser make it easier to browse the codebase by components.

What are the ways you do it? Is there anything similar available for functional programming?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你有哪些方法来适应一个新的代码库？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你有哪些方法來適應一個新的代碼庫？
description_zh-Hans:
像Eclipse的Java Browsing Perspective(https://querix.com/go/beginner/Content/05_workbench/01_ls/02_interface/01_perspectives/java_browsing.htm)、Visual Studio的Object Browser这样的工具使得按组件浏览代码库变得更加容易。

你有哪些方法？有什么类似的东西可以用于函数式编程吗？
description_zh-Hant:
像Eclipse的Java Browsing Perspective(https://querix.com/go/beginner/Content/05_workbench/01_ls/02_interface/01_perspectives/java_browsing.htm)、Visual Studio的Object Browser這樣的工具使得按組件瀏覽代碼庫變得更加容易。

你有哪些方法？有什麼類似的東西可以用於函數式編程嗎？
